reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My grandchild loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My 18 month grandchild goes for this drawing board. all the time and scribble scribble, for a long time, before she gets distracted by other toys, as all toddlers do. Then, she goes back for more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The little ones love them!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased four of these for great nieces and nephew. All toddlers 1-3 yo. The kiddos love them and it keeps them entertained for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves this drawing board!
reviews.reviewText: This magnetic drawing board is great for kids to practice their writing skills. I purchased it for my son and he loves it. He use it to practice letters and numbers over and over again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kids loved it … but the legs are so easily removable that they became an entire separate toy for my 1 and 2 year olds. Also idk how but my son managed to poke through the front so idk if my kid is strong or the toy is weak lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got two of these. Twin 2yr old grand daughters. They love them ,perfect scribble board for young ones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described and perfect for my 2.5 yr old boy!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good gift for kids
reviews.reviewText: I bought two for my two kids, 4years old and 6years old. They like drawing with them and clean that again and again. Sometimes they sit on it as a chair, so silly boys. Of course they love them. It's a good toy for little kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toy is very good.My son likes drawing very much.He can draw whatever he wants on it at will, and he can erase it at any time.I don't need to worry about him drawing at home.
